delete.title: Delete User
delete.text: The user {name} will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
delete.successMessage: The user {name} has been successfully deleted.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.text: The password for the user {name} will be reset. Are you sure you want to continue?
resetPassword.successMessage: The password for the user {name} has been successfully reset.

delete.title: Delete Role
delete.text: The role {name} will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
delete.successMessage: The role {name} has been successfully deleted.
